name: Comets (TheKindWolf)
description:
Warning: This game has flashing colors and lights.

In this game you play as a spaceship that can shoot to destroy comets, there are power-ups that will enhance your abilities and enemies that will shoot you and get harder if you don't die. Score 6000 points to win!!!

A game made for the Pirate Software game jam of January 2022.

TheKindWolf (Programming)

Twitch:  https://www.twitch.tv/bitwise_wolf

Twitter: https://twitter.com/The_KindWolf

Thornestarr (Programming, Sound/Music)

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thornestarr 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Silvers_tweets

LuckyLuke (Art and UI)

Artstation: https://lluke.artstation.com/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Luke04880547

These aren't asteroids, they are comets obviously...
